info.author: Daniel Kiss
info.description:
Sample Microservice
===================

First steps
-----------
* Clone this repo
* Change code directory name in docs/conf.py line 22
* Install admin.sch utils module with update_utils.sh script

Style guide
-----------
* Code style: PEP8
* Coments: Google style https://google.github.io/styleguide/pyguide.html?showone=Comments#Comments

Documentation
-------------
* Go to doc dir: ``cd docs``
* Updating / add new files: ``sphinx-apidoc -f -o . ./../<code dir>``
* Generating Sphinx docs: ``make html``
* index file location: doc/_build/html/index.html

Testing
-------
* Python's unittest module

Documents
---------
* Logging: https://fangpenlin.com/posts/2012/08/26/good-logging-practice-in-python/
* Web server: https://sanic.readthedocs.io
* Swagger: https://swagger.io/
* Swagger ui: https://github.com/channelcat/sanic-openapi
* Swagger client: https://bravado.readthedocs.io
* Sphinx: http://docs.python-guide.org/en/latest/writing/documentation/
info.name: adminsch-sample-microservice
